2.text: We payed a lot of money to make sure you do.
Just kidding the sound effects are pirated from the internet.

3.text: You must be astonished by your own skill.
Did you know, that you can collect the food from a distance?
Your bluetooth device is ready to pair.

4.text: I'm running out of things to say.
I'm not a very creative person.

5.text: Interestingly enough, Albert Einstein couldn't reach this level.
This is because this game was released after he died.
You're welcome for the history lesson.

6.text: Did you know, the average person spends 6 months of their life waiting for a red light to turn green?
In America, the average person spends 2 years of their life waiting at red lights.

7.text: Many people don't know how to distinguish between your and you're.
Your is the possessive form of you.
You're is a contraction of you are.
You're welcome for your grammar lesson.

8.text: In Germany it is illegal to run out of gas on the autobahn.
If you do, you will be fined.
Try running away from the cops with no gas.
Micheal Smolik is comming for you.

9.text: The first 9 weeks of a cat's life is called a kitten.
Unlike discord moderators, we mean the animal.

10.text: Jesus Christ, you're still playing this game?
Don't you have to finish your Informatik Klausurersatzleistung?

11.text: Anyway, did you know, that I am in love with Ryan Reynolds?

12.text: The average american kid has dodged several bullets at twelve years of age.
Yet you still fell for the "I'm a girl" trick.
Didn't dodge that one, did you?

13.text: The game will crash if you reach level 14.
It's not a bug, if it's a feature.
